original_text: And Abimelech lived at Arumah, and Zebul drove out Gaal and his relatives, so that they could not dwell at Shechem.
korean_text: 아비멜렉은 아루마에 거주하고 스불은 가알과 그의 형제들을 쫓아내어 세겜에 거주하지 못하게 하더니

sentences.original_text: and Zebul drove out Gaal and his relatives
so that they could not dwell at Shechem
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 세겜에 거하지 못하게 하려 함이라
